TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_belac, title = belac, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/belac} }

S.FORM: kamu nu hulam:米 nanu belac ku sapisaaam. 稀飯是由米所煮成的. sibelac 有米；帶米 sibelac tabuyu' miadup. 帶米上山打獵. kasibelac 帶米 kasibelac taumah. 帶米到田裡.
kamo no holam:米 nano belac ko sapisaaam. 稀飯是由米所煮成的. sibelac 有米；帶米 sibelac taboyo' miadop. 帶米上山打獵. kasibelac 帶米 kasibelac taomah. 帶米到田裡.
